post:
Hi all :)

After a few problems that were out of our control, as well as a few things which needed ironing out during our initial beta phase, [VPN.SH](http://www.vpn.sh) is now ready to launch the second, and final beta phase before going live.

You’ll be able to access anything online anonymously as well as having access to US Netflix, Hulu, Pandora and any other US only accounts from the UK/Europe.

Once the beta is over, we’ll be going live as long as everything works properly. Then we’ll be offering different packages for different styles of online use.

You can find out more about our services on our website: http://www.vpn.sh

If you want to sign up for the beta then make an account on [our order page](http://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php) and order the beta package then you’ll receive all the relevant information in an email.

Please be patient as we predict a lot people will be trying to sign up and order over the next few days.

Thanks!

[Tweet us](http://www.twitter.com/vpnsh)
[Like us on Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/vpndotsh)

NOTE: Just a quick note, some people have assumed that because PayPal is a payment option on the order page, we will charge. There's no details needed, as it's a free service, it won't ask for your PayPal details. It's just there ready for when we go live.
